concept.title: SDC Record Files
concept.shortdesc: Use the SDC Record Files destination to write records to a local file system. records are JSON files of a specific format.

conbody.p: Use SDC Record Files to create record files, such as error record files, that you want to easily reprocess. You can use the Directory origin with the Data Collector Records data format to process records written by SDC Record Files.
You can also use SDC Record Files when you want to write output records in JSON format to a local file system.
